trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示期間文字輸入事件的綜合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is a FrameworkTextComposition when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是 FrameworkTextComposition，當使用者輸入的文字放到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]和<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>，或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: FrameworkTextComposition is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkTextComposition 是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>基底類別

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>類別會定義屬性會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>物件，表示文字撰寫的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入文字<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>為<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: 終結撰寫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的組合長度 Unicode 符號中。

trans-unit.source: The CompositionLength property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength 屬性表示自上次已輸入多少個字元<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，才有意義<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, CompositionLength is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件發生時，CompositionLength 為 –&1;，而<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>屬性指出此組合的長度。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進 CompositionLength。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: 目前的撰寫 Unicode 符號中的長度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得撰寫文字中發生的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，才有意義<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>發生事件時，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A>為 –&1;，而<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A>屬性會指出撰寫文字的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進 CompositionOffset。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 撰寫文字中發生的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 的最終文字的長度符號時取得<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, ResultLength is –1.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>事件發生時，ResultLength 為-1。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進 ResultLength。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 的最終文字的長度符號時<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得最終的文字位移時<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>事件發生時，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>為-1。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進 ResultOffset。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 最終的文字位移時<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>
